item.title: Markdown (part 1)
item.author: exyzlearning@gmail.com (En)
item.description: Add a mark before each point. - Example Bold font in the text, Example. **Example** Italic font in the text, Example *Example* Paragraph title: Example Example Example # Example ## Example ### Example Insert a code section: Method 1: with highlight print ('Hello word') ``` print ('Hello word') ``` Insert a code section: Method 2: with highlight and line numbers 1print ('Hello word') {{< highlight javascript "linenos=inline" >}} print ('Hello word') {{</ highlight >}} Ignore Markdown formatting /*.

item.title: About me
item.author: exyzlearning@gmail.com (En)
item.description: Hi, my name is En. I am a neurosecience researcher and a data science enthusiast. Recently, I just start to pick up my coding skills which is definetly full of fun. For several years, I am kind of unsure about this decision, since I knew about the coding skills relatively late, as compare to other students, I don’t know if it is too late to start it. However, doing research has led me to learn programming to solve the problems efficiently.
